sources.title: Katy's Love Affair
sources.description: Title: Katy's Love Affair Summary: The fortunes of an upper-class British family are followed through three wars and four generations. Directed by: Herbert Wilcox Actors: Anna Neagle, Michael Wilding, Gladys Young Production Company: Herbert Wilcox Productions Release Date: 8 September 1947 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 On New Years Eve, 1899, baronet's son Edward Courtney becomes engaged to Kate, his mother's maid, much to the scandal of London society. The film then follows their family through four generations, with separations, joys, tragedies, and service in the Boer War, WWI, and WWII.

metadata.Plot: On New Years Eve, 1899, baronet's son Edward Courtney becomes engaged to Kate, his mother's maid, much to the scandal of London society. The film then follows their family through four generations, with separations, joys, tragedies, and service in the Boer War, WWI, and WWII.
